sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

SELECT mr.id as rest_id, mr.gen_shop_id, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, mr.shop_logo, mr.address,
 coalesce((select rwr.rest_id where rwr.rest_id is not null),0) as count_rest_wl
FROM m_restaurant mr 
left join r_wishlist_rest rwr on (mr.id=rwr.rest_id and rwr.user_id = @user_id) 
WHERE market_id = @market ORDER BY random() LIMIT @limit;

SELECT mr.id as rest_id, mr.gen_shop_id, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name, mr.shop_logo, mr.address,
 coalesce((select rwr.rest_id where rwr.rest_id is not null),0) as count_rest_wl
FROM m_restaurant mr 
left join r_wishlist_rest rwr on (mr.id=rwr.rest_id and rwr.user_id = @user_id) 
WHERE market_id = @market ORDER BY random() LIMIT @limit;
